29

Piotr Hello?

Lydia Hi, Piotr. It's Lydia. You called.

Piotr Yes, I just wanted to check if you called Ron Peters.

Lydia Yes, I did. Yesterday.

Piotr What did he say? Is there a problem?

Lydia No, not really. He can do the presentation, but not in the morning.

Piotr Why didn't he want to speak then?

Lydia No idea. Anyway, I telephoned the Century Hotel. They have a free room at lunchtime.

Piotr That's fine. Did you book it?

Lydia No, I didn't. Sorry about that. I'll call them now and I'll check with Ron Peters.

Piotr Great. Thanks Lydia.
